Midwest Dirt Legion

Building a better community for Cisgender women, Gender Non-Conforming, and Transgender mountain bikers

Our focus is on bringing passionate people and organizations in the Twin Cities together through meet-ups, group rides, and skills sessions.

Our long term goal is to provide a blueprint to create inclusive and accessible events and communities.

Founders of Midwest Dirt Legion

    She/Her

  • Ash Murray
